text: Chan Hyung Lee (; born August 11, 1992) is a South Korean kickboxer. ==Championships and awards== *2015 WKN Intercontinental Lightweight Champion *2017 RISE -60kg Champion *2019 KNOCK OUT Asia Lightweight Tournament Runner- up ==Kickboxing record== {| class="toccolours" width=100% style="clear:both; margin:1.5em auto; font-size:88%; text-align:center;" |- ! colspan=2 style="background:#A9A9A9" | Kickboxing record |- valign="top" | 21 Wins (7 (T)KOs), 10 Losses, 1 Draw {| class="wikitable" width="100%" |- align="center" bgcolor="#dddddd" | Date || Result || Opponent || Event || Location || Method || Round || Time |- style="text-align:center; background:#FFBBBB;" | 2019-12-08||Loss||align=left| Suakim PK Saenchaimuaythaigym || BOM 2-6～THE Battle Of Muaythai SEASON II vol.6 || Tokyo, Japan || TKO (Corner Stoppage)|| 3 || 3:00 |- ! style=background:white colspan=9 | |- style="text-align:center; background:#FFBBBB;" | 2019-09-16||Loss ||align=left| Kento Haraguchi || Rise World Series 2019 Final Round || Chiba (city), Japan || Decision (Unanimous)||3 ||3:00 |- style="text-align:center; background:#FFBBBB;" | 2019-07-21|| Loss ||align=left| Genji Umeno || Rise World Series 2019 Semi Finals || Tokyo, Japan || Decision (Unanimous)|| 3 || 3:00 |- style="text- align:center; background:#FFBBBB;" | 2019-04-29 || Loss ||align=left| Yodlekpet Or.
